subject: Arena Football
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Aaron Garcia re-signed with the Dragons for his 15th Arena League season.The 37-year-old Garcia threw for 3,500 yards and 78 touchdowns in 2008.
snippet: Quarterback Aaron Garcia re-signed with the Dragons for his 15th Arena League season.The 37-year-old Garcia threw for 3,500 yards and 78 touchdowns in 2008.
